Text: Similarly, because of economic tensions between the US and Iran in the middle east, the crude price and dollar price have fluctuated. These scenarios lead to the shift in the dollar pound exchange rate from .80 to 1.0.
Cause: Similarly, because of economic tensions between the US and Iran in the middle east, the crude price and dollar price have fluctuated.
Effect: These scenarios lead to the shift in the dollar pound exchange rate from .80 to 1.0.
Sentence: <e1>Similarly, because of economic tensions between the US and Iran in the middle east, the crude price and dollar price have fluctuated.</e1> <e2>These scenarios lead to the shift in the dollar pound exchange rate from .80 to 1.0.</e2>
